hub.title: Em1t | Hub
hub.hero: Welcome to my development hub. I do random things here.

logo1.title: Em1t's logo #1
logo1.description: This is the very first concept of my logo.

logo2.title: Em1t's logo #2
logo2.description: The original version of my logo. Next are just variations.

logo3.title: Em1t's logo #3
logo3.description: I have added a small 3D effect to it, and changed the colors.

logo4.title: Em1t's logo #4
logo4.description: I've added a heart to the '1' as I feel like it's more personal.

background.title: Background attempt #1
background.description: This was made in Photoshop back in 2018. I tried creating a simple background for my school presentation.

m4.title: Blender 3D model #1
m4.description: I have created a detailed 3D model of an M4A1 assault rifle (I'm a fan of FPS games). This model was used in my own FPS game concept.

earth.title: Blender 3D model #2
earth.description: This 3D model was created by me, with the help of a BlenderGuru tutorial. Nevertheless, it's pretty impressive.

game.title: FPS game concept #1
game.description: In this concept, I have managed to create an FPS character controller, imported my own 3D model of an M4, and created plenty of animations, including shooting.

page1.title: Website #1
page1.description: This website was created by me for my planned startup. It has gone through many iterations during the design process, but this is what I settled for. You can find it on https://ametrine.host

page2.title: Login/Register #1
page2.description: This register page will be used in my personal GitHub project. This is the first design I've made for this register page and I will most likely keep it.

lin1.title: Lin logo #1
lin1.description: This was a profile picture which I made for my Discord moderation bot.

lin2.title: Lin logo #2
lin2.description: Lin logo but for the development server, where I tested new features.

contact.title: Em1t | Contact
contact.description: I'm open for any suggestions, job offers, or just to chat

navigation.announcement: This page has been submitted for the 18th Junior Internet competition
